para.emphasis: When should I run autoconf or aclocal?

listitem.para: You should only run aclocal or autoconf if configure.ac has been modified. Running aclocal followed by autoconf will produce updated versions of aclocal.m4 and configure. The easiest way to update these files is to run gmake reconfigure from your build directory.
The current build system requires the developer to use autoconf version 2.5 or newer. Older versions of autoconf are not mopatible with the DBS.
